item.title: Version 0.9.4
item.description:
MPlayerX X.X.X

2010/XX/XX
  • UI tweaks
  • when cursor moved onto the time slider, a time hint will display according to the current cusor position
  • Feature Delete: when pause, key → will not function "frame step" anymore, since frameStep doesn't support backward, it will cause confusion
  • If one Movie is finished at FullScreen, and AutoPlayNext is ON, and there really is a next Movie could be played. the Fullscreen status will continue, rather than exit

MPlayerX 0.9.4

2010/01/05
  • bug fix: crash on case-sensitive partition
  • New: Play from last stopped place

MPlayerX 0.9.3

2010/01/04
  • Rename to MPlayerX

    • (Sorry for my lame English, but most users thought MPlayerX looks more popular)

    according to name changing, the update system will NOT succeed THIS TIME

    please go to http://mplayerx.googlecode.com/files/MPlayerX.zip for MPlayerX 0.9.3

    or you could change you current MplayerX.app to MPlayerX.app and open it once again to update

MplayerX 0.9.2

2010/01/03
  • add sparkle framework to support autoUpdate
  • Enable liabass to render text subtitle
  • add change subtitle size while playing
